About

Hi!

I graduated from the University Of Exeter in Biological Sciences in the summer of 2019. I've been learning the skills required for front end development for a few months now and I'm excited to apply what I've learnt in a professional environment. I'm eager to learn new technologies, develop my existing skills and expand my understanding of the web development life cycle. I'll work hard and I'm sure I'll fit in well with any team.
